title: Eldritch Knight
content:
yourself from the mace effect. (Use the camp clothes visual and just stay in your underwear for that caveman vibe )

Get Tavern Brawler to add twice the Strength to your throwsGet Shattered Flail and bond with it so it will come back to your hand once thrown (This way you can hit an enemy every turn by simply throwing and you get an awesome heal too )Get dueling fighting style to add + 2 damageGet Caustic Band Ring ( Myconid colony trader ) + 2 acid damage with weapon attacksGet Ring of Flinging
